1   package org.javautil.dataset.testdata;
2   
3   import org.javautil.collections.ListHelper;
4   import org.javautil.dataset.ColumnMetadata;
5   import org.javautil.dataset.DataType;
6   import org.javautil.dataset.DatasetMetadataImpl;
7   import org.javautil.dataset.MatrixDataset;
8   import org.javautil.dataset.MutableDataset;
9   import org.javautil.util.Day;
10  
11  public class ConvictionsDataset {
12  	public static MutableDataset getConvictions() {
13  		final DatasetMetadataImpl convictionMeta = new DatasetMetadataImpl() {
14  			{
15  				addColumn(new ColumnMetadata("STATE", 0, DataType.STRING, null,
16  						null, null, null, null, null));
17  				addColumn(new ColumnMetadata("CITY", 1, DataType.STRING, null,
18  						null, null, null, null, null));
19  				addColumn(new ColumnMetadata("Date", 2, DataType.DATE, null,
20  						null, null, null, null, null));
21  				addColumn(new ColumnMetadata("Days in Jail", 3,
22  						DataType.DOUBLE, null, null, null, null, null, null));
23  			}
24  		};
25  
26  		final MatrixDataset mds = new MatrixDataset(convictionMeta);
27  		mds.addRow(ListHelper
28  				.toList("TX", "Southlake", new Day(2007, 12, 1), 3));
29  		mds.addRow(ListHelper.toList("TX", "Coppell", Day.today(), 3));
30  		return mds;
31  
32  	}
33  
34  	public MutableDataset getDataset() {
35  		return getConvictions();
36  	}
37  }
